## Developing Data Products Week 2 Assignment

As per the guidelines, an interactive map is made via leaflet package in R Markdown.
The github link is https://github.com/IshaqDurrani/Developing-Data-Products

Here are two visit places in Islamabad, Pakistan i.e. Daman-e-Koh and Faisal Masjid.

```{r}
library(leaflet)
m <- leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%  # Add default OpenStreetMap map tiles
  addMarkers(lat=33.7395, lng=73.0554, popup="Daman-e-Koh, Islamabad") %>%
  addMarkers(lat=33.7299, lng=73.0384, popup="Faisal Masjid, Islamabad") #%>%
 # %addMarkers(lat=33.6833, lng=73.0666, popup="LoK Virsa Museum, Islamabad") #%>%
  #setView (lat=28.6129, lng=77.2295, zoom=16) 
  
m  # Print the map
```
